Public Remarks: This stunning residence has been exquisitely designed and built to ensure that exacting standards were achieved. This light filled residence offers a comfortable layout with an incredibly efficient use of space. Thoughtful planning of the home was paramount in the design process and is apparent in every corner of the home. Large south facing windows maximize solar gain in the winter months and the large overhangs shield the house in the summer. Utilizing passive solar design techniques, a two storey concrete wall serves as a thermal mass and regulates the interior temperature as does the hydronic radiant heating in the polished concrete floors. The quality of construction is second to none and is built to last. Semi-lofted legal suite situated at the side of the house. See virtual tour.
